newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Anhui Expressway in talks on new projects.
newsitem.headline: Anhui Expressway in talks on new projects.

text.p: Anhui Expressway Co Ltd said on Friday it had signed two letters of intent to participate in two expressway projects -- Gaohe-Jiezidun Expressway and Jiefubeng Expressway -- in China's Anhui Province.
"The negotiations in respect of the projects are at a preliminary stage and agreements might or might not materialize," the company said in the statement.
The China toll-road operator said it was part of the company's strategy to expand its portfolio of highway projects in Anhui Province.
